name: 陳長忻
objective:
作為建築師顯示其技藝性的主要圖面，細部大樣詳圖用來表達構造技術與材料品質。然而，細部設計學習養成深具挑戰性，因為設計作品集雖具細部設計照片或圖說，但缺乏說明其設計所產生的影響以及生成原因；而具專業性的細部設計書籍僅是詳盡紀錄複雜的建造細節，甚少解釋其設計動機。

因此，本課程選用由 Farshid Moussavi 和 Michael Kubo 所編撰的《The Function of Ornament》的架構引導學生對細部設計的認識。透過整理知名案例圖說及製作細部模型，以及實地參訪完成之建築物之細部做法並記錄繪製，以彌合了上述學習的挑戰，讓學生能夠對相互關聯的建造細節與型式生成知識更全面的理解。

As the main drawing for the architects to show their skills, the drawings of the detail design are used to express the construction technology and materiality. However, the effective learning of detailed design is very challenging since though the design portfolios have clear design photos or illustrations, it lacks the explanation of the impact of the design and the reasons for its generate; and professional, detailed tool books only record complex construction details, little explanation of the motivation for its design. 

By sorting out well-known case illustrations and making detailed physical models, as well as on-site visits to the completed buildings and recording and drawing their details, the above-mentioned learning challenges can be bridged, allowing students to have a more comprehensive understanding that construction details and their generation mechanisms knowledge.
